We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced professional to join our team for a project involving advanced database management and data visualization. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in large language models (LLMs), Snowflake, AWS, database design, and Power BI.

Responsibilities:

Design, implement, and maintain database solutions using Snowflake and AWS.
Develop and optimize complex queries for data extraction and analysis.

item.title: DB/Power BI Developer    - Upwork
item.description:
Langate is an award-winning provider of web development services in 3 main categories: business, healthcare, and education. At Langate, we're passionate about crafting digital solutions that make a real impact. We take immense pride in our strong collaboration with the U.S.  We're here to shape the future of technology, one milestone at a time.

In addition to technical expertise, we value excellent communication skills. Collaboration and effective teamwork are the cornerstones of our success, and we believe in fostering an environment where everyone’s voice is heard and valued.

To thrive in this role, we’re seeking candidates with a minimum of 5+ years of Software Engineering experience in BI/SQL development and with a minimum of 4 years of professional experience in working with the Power BI tool  and  building reports.   

About the project:  
The project is uniquely configurable cloud-based platform is designed to guide and reinforce behaviors that drive results; mobilize employees; strategically align individuals with company values and objectives; and solve an organization’s ever-changing business issues. The system’s Activity Streams and Leaderboard allow users to see how they compare alongside others in the organization, which helps businesses create a culture of recognition where individuals feel more connected to the company and their coworkers through Manager Discretionary, Peer-to-Peer, Service Anniversary & Milestones and Sales Incentive Programs.

Responsibilities:
• Monitor incoming/outgoing data as well as create/modify code for processes relating to incoming/outgoing data feeds.
• Create, maintain, and optimize database elements using stored procedures, views, functions, triggers, jobs, and execution plan analysis.  
• Configure embedded Power BI for multi-tenant environments, build simple reports.
• Planning and maintenance of deployment protocols for Legacy and Microsoft Azure applications. Implement CI/CD in line with existing protocols.
• Source code and deployment process maintenance.
• Assist with SQL maintenance, configuration, and optimization.
• Fill in with development, reporting and administrative tasks where needed.
• Research new MSSQL features and data engineering trends to help keep DataOps up to date.

Requirements:
• MS SQL Server with T-SQL – minimum 5 plus years’ of experience.  
• Azure SQL and practical knowledge of the following  tools and technologies will be important to us:  Power BI, DAX, SSIS, SSRS, ADF, Azure Data Lake.
• Knowledge of Power BI environment architecture and of optimization techniques in Power BI.
• Experience in developing the BI platform and analytical solutions built in the Power BI environment.
• Experience in building ETL processes
• Visual Studuo + SSDT.  
• Experience with SSRS, creating new queries / reports and setting up and maintaining services and shared service components.
• SSIS experience.
• Experience with setting up Azure Power BI.  
• English – upper-intermediate +

Team: 2 Senior .NET devs, 3 Middle  .NET devs, 3 Manual QA, 1 Senior Automation QA, 1 Markup/Front-End dev, PM/Scrum master.

Schedule: 5/2, 8-hour working day (40 hr per week), flexible schedule. No late meetings and overtime. 


Hourly Range: $34.00-$37.00
Posted On: May 20, 2024 12:01 UTC
Category: Database Development
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Azure SQL Database
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior Data Analyst required for a 3-4 months project - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:

We need a tool that scans our Windows servers, both domain-joined and workgroup, to discover all user and service accounts and collect their details. The tool should:

Discover Accounts: Identify all user and service accounts on the servers, including both local and domain accounts. This includes accounts directly in local groups or nested in AD groups within local groups.

Collect Account Details: Gather key attributes for each account, such as:

ID
Description
Last logon time
Group memberships
Account status (active/inactive)
Creation date
Last password change
Create a Dashboard: Display the collected data in an organized, user-friendly dashboard. The dashboard should allow us to search, filter, and generate reports on the accounts.

Key Points:

Comprehensive Discovery: Ensure the tool identifies all relevant user and service accounts.
Detailed Data Collection: Collect comprehensive account attributes.
Visualization: Develop a dashboard for easy visualization and interaction with the data."

Note: Tool needs to be scalable for future expansion/plugins to discover accounts on other target systems as well.

Budget: $5,000
Posted On: May 20, 2024 14:25 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Data Science
Skills: Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Data Science
Country: Pakistan

item.title: Power Bi Best Practices and Automation for Restaurant Client - Upwork
item.description:
We are leveraging Power Bi to pull data from Revel point of sale. We are looking to establish some best practices and automation for data to automatically be pulled and refreshed within PowerBI for the last 4 week period, updating itself with each subsequent day.

There are two methods we would like to go about doing this. The first is, if it's possible within PowerBI, we can sort the total quantity of products and modifiers that are used on average within every 15 minute period, and then push that data to a Google Sheet to convert the products and modifiers to the KDS tags that we use within the kitchen.

The second way would be, if we cannot do it the first way, if we can just get the product data and modifier data to automatically pull and display within a Google Sheet, then we can do all the calculations there in order to get to the end we desire, of seeing all the KDS tags and the quantity of each we need (on average) every 15 minutes.

We would like to setup a discovery call so we can establish a proper scope and confirm this is even possible.



Posted On: May 20, 2024 13:02 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Customer Service, Clerical Skills, Data Entry, Administrative Support, Spreadsheet Software, Email Marketing, Acuity Scheduling
Skills: Customer Service, Clerical Skills, Data Entry, Administrative Support, Spreadsheet Software, Email Marketing, Acuity Scheduling
Country: United States

item.title: Power Query Developer (Back End) - Upwork
item.description:
We're hiring a Power Query Expert with five years of relevant experience to handle back-end data development. Your role involves using Power Query to transform and manage data sources efficiently.

DO NOT APPLY IF:
You want more than $3/h (offers above $3/h will be automatically rejected).
You do not have five years experience
You expect a rate increase after starting (asking for more will automatically end your contract).
You don’t have at least 10 hours a week available regularly (if you are overloaded with work/commute/commitments, DO NOT APPLY).
You are looking for short-term work (less than 3 months). This is a long-term engagement.

Key Information About the Job:
This is a PART-TIME freelance position.
Irregular hours, from 0 to 10 hours a week, sometimes more if you have availability.
You MUST use our time-tracking system along with Upwork time tracking.
You MUST estimate effort for each task.
You MUST communicate progress, blockers, issues, and availability.
Hours of work will be agreed upon based on the project and your availability, with flexibility.
Begin your proposal with "INTERESTED" to show that you have read everything.
This is a 3-month position with the possibility of extension if you perform well, with 0 days’ notice on both sides.

ABOUT THE ROLE:
We are seeking a Power BI Report Developer with the following responsibilities:
Develop and maintain Power Query scripts for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand data needs.
Design data models and relationships for reporting.
Optimize queries for performance.
Automate data processes for accuracy and timeliness.
Troubleshoot data issues and document processes.
Proficiency in Power Query/M.
Understanding of SQL and data concepts.

item.title: Data Analyst and Visualization Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Data Analyst and Visualization Expert

Job Overview:

We are seeking a talented and experienced Data Analyst and Visualization Expert for a project aimed at transforming our reports into visually appealing and insightful graphs and charts. The ideal candidate will also be proficient in automating data-driven conclusions to streamline our decision-making process.

Responsibilities:

• Analyze data from various sources and compile comprehensive reports.
• Create visually appealing and informative graphs, charts, and dashboards using tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar.
• Develop automated processes to generate data-driven conclusions and insights.
• Collaborate with team members to understand their data needs and provide actionable insights.
• Ensure data accuracy and consistency across all reports and visualizations.
• Provide recommendations for improving data collection and analysis processes.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a Data Analyst, Data Visualization Expert, or similar role.
• Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
• Strong knowledge of data analysis tools and techniques (e.g., Excel, SQL, Python, R).
• Experience with automated reporting and dashboard creation.
• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Strong attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy.
• Effective communication skills to present data findings to non-technical stakeholders.
• Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
• Experience in the advertising or marketing industry.
• Familiarity with CRM systems and data tracking tools.
• Understanding of key performance metrics and their impact on business decisions.

Project Details:

1-2 weeks

Application Process:

Please include the following in your application:

• A brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you are a good fit for this project.
• Examples of previous data analysis and visualization work.
• References from previous clients or employers.

We look forward to working with a skilled professional who can help us turn our data into actionable insights through compelling visualizations.

item.description:
Job Summary:



We are seeking an experienced NetSuite Administrator/Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with NetSuite ERP, including system customization, configuration, and integration. This role requires a proactive professional capable of managing and optimizing our NetSuite platform to meet business requirements and drive operational efficiency.



Key Responsibilities:



- **System Administration:**

  - Manage day-to-day operations of the NetSuite platform, including user account maintenance, data imports, and system customization.

  - Perform regular system audits and prepare for NetSuite upgrades and new feature releases.



- **Customization and Development:**

  - Develop and maintain custom scripts using SuiteScript, SuiteFlow, SuiteBuilder, and SuiteTalk.

  - Customize NetSuite fields, forms, records, and workflows to support business requirements.

  - Implement and manage integrations between NetSuite and other business systems.



- **Process Improvement:**

  - Analyze business processes and workflows, identify areas for improvement, and implement best practices.

  - Work with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.



- **Experience:**

  - 5  to 10 years of hands-on experience with NetSuite ERP administration and development.

  - Proven experience in scripting with SuiteScript, and creating custom workflows and forms.

  - Experience with SuiteCloud Developer tools including SuiteBuilder, SuiteFlow, SuiteAnalytics, and SuiteTalk.



- **Skills:**

Knowledge of Power BI would be greatly appreciated
Strong understanding of business processes, particularly in finance, sales, and operations.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work under pressure.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Project management skills are a plus.


- **Certifications:**

  - NetSuite certifications (Administrator, SuiteFoundation, or ERP Consultant) are highly desirable.

item.title: I need someone to build me a Hotel Booking Software for me. - Upwork
item.description:
I need a hotel booking software like Booking.com involves a wide range of software knowledge and skills, spanning front-end, back-end, database management, security, and more. Here’s a comprehensive breakdown:

1. Front-End Development:

    HTML/CSS: Essential for structuring and styling web pages.
    JavaScript: For creating interactive elements and dynamic content.
    Frameworks/Libraries: React.js, Angular, or Vue.js for building a responsive and efficient user interface.
    Responsive Design: Ensuring the application works well on various devices and screen sizes using frameworks like Bootstrap or Material-UI.

2. Back-End Development:

    Programming Languages: Proficiency in languages such as Python (with Django or Flask), Ruby (with Ruby on Rails), Java (with Spring), or JavaScript (with Node.js).
    Frameworks: Depending on the chosen language, knowledge of relevant web frameworks is crucial for handling the server-side logic.
    RESTful APIs: Designing and implementing APIs for communication between the front-end and back-end.

3. Database Management:

    SQL Databases: Knowledge of relational databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MariaDB for storing structured data.
    NoSQL Databases: Experience with databases like MongoDB or Cassandra for handling unstructured data or for scalability purposes.
    ORM (Object-Relational Mapping): Tools like SQLAlchemy (Python), ActiveRecord (Rails), or Sequelize (Node.js) for managing database queries in an object-oriented manner.

4. Cloud Computing and Deployment:

    Cloud Platforms: Familiarity with AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure for deploying, managing, and scaling the application.
    CI/CD Pipelines: Using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment processes.
    Containerization: Knowledge of Docker for creating isolated environments and Kubernetes for orchestrating containerized applications.

5. Security:

    Authentication and Authorization: Implementing secure login mechanisms, role-based access control, and OAuth.
    Data Encryption: Ensuring sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
    Vulnerability Management: Understanding common web vulnerabilities (e.g., SQL injection, XSS) and how to mitigate them using frameworks, libraries, and best practices.

6. Payment Integration:

    Payment Gateways: Integrating with payment processing services like Stripe, PayPal, or Square to handle transactions securely.
    PCI Compliance: Ensuring the application complies with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI DSS).

7. Search and Filtering:

    Elasticsearch: Implementing a robust search functionality for quick and efficient data retrieval.
    Faceted Search: Enabling users to filter results based on various criteria such as price, location, amenities, etc.

8. Booking and Reservation Management:

    Calendar Management: Implementing systems to manage availability, bookings, cancellations, and modifications.
    Third-Party Integrations: Connecting with external systems and services (e.g., Google Maps for location data, external property management systems).

9. Analytics and Reporting:

    Data Analytics: Using tools and frameworks to gather insights from user data, booking trends, and system performance.
    Reporting Tools: Creating dashboards and reports for administrators and stakeholders using tools like Tableau, Power BI, or custom solutions.

10. Performance Optimization:

    Caching Strategies: Implementing caching at various levels (e.g., database queries, server-side, and client-side caching) using tools like Redis or Memcached.
    Load Balancing: Distributing traffic across multiple servers to ensure high availability and reliability.

11. Version Control:

    Git: Proficiency in using Git for version control, managing code repositories, and collaborating with team members using platforms like GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket.

12. Project Management:

    Agile Methodologies: Using Scrum or Kanban for managing development processes and ensuring continuous delivery.
    Collaboration Tools: Familiarity with tools like Jira, Trello, or Asana for task management and team collaboration.

Once the contract is made payment milestone is like 15% after 1 month (30% work done), 15% after 2 months (once 60% work is done), 20% after 3 months (once 100% work is done and supplied) At the end of the task. It has to be proven for next 3 months. Then rest 50% money will be given

Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:WordPress, Web Design, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, API, AngularJS
Skills: WordPress, Web Design, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, API, AngularJS

item.title: Power Business Intelligence Analyst  - Upwork
item.description:
Power Business Intelligence Analyst

Salary: Negotiable subject to skills and experience.

Requirements:
  
Male or Female
At least 5 years to 10 years’ experience
Certified Data Analytic
Business Analysis & Process Management
Portfolio of pervious project is needed.


Position Overview:
As a Power BI Developer at Scott Park Group Inc, you will play a crucial role in developing operational reports, automated dashboards, and insightful data presentations using Power BI and other reporting tools. You will collaborate closely with various stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into functional specifications for reporting applications. Additionally, you will leverage your expertise in database fundamentals to ensure efficient data extraction, shaping, and validation for reporting and analytics solutions.

Key Accountabilities:
Develop operational reports such as dealing and financial system extracts:
• Design and implement operational reports to extract relevant data from various systems and databases.
• Ensure accuracy and efficiency in data extraction processes to meet business needs.
Develop automated reports and dashboards using Power BI and other reporting tools:
• Utilize Power BI and other reporting tools to automate report generation processes.
• Design and create interactive dashboards to visualize data insights effectively.
Understand business requirements to set functional specifications for reporting applications:
• Collaborate with stakeholders to comprehend business objectives and requirements.
• Translate business needs into detailed functional specifications for reporting applications.
Have a great skill in extracting report presentation for the management:
• Develop visually appealing and insightful report presentations tailored for management review.
• Ensure clarity and relevance of information presented to facilitate decision-making processes.
Implement Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) practices:
• Establish and maintain effective ALM practices to manage the lifecycle of reporting applications.
• Coordinate with development teams to ensure seamless integration and deployment of reporting solutions.
Documentation:
• Create comprehensive documentation for reporting applications, including design specifications, user guides, and technical documentation.
• Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation to support ongoing development and maintenance efforts.
Facilitate Testing:
• Develop and execute testing strategies to ensure the quality and reliability of reporting applications.
• Collaborate with QA teams to conduct thorough testing, identify defects, and implement necessary fixes.
Version Control:
• Implement version control systems to manage code and configuration changes for reporting applications.
• Ensure proper versioning and tracking of changes to maintain a reliable development environment.

Tools:
• MS SQL Server BI Stack (including SSRS and TSQL)
• Power BI
• Power Query
• MDX
• DAX

Skills, Knowledge, and Experience:
• Ability to quickly stage and shape data from various sources into reporting and analytics                
               solutions.
• Experience in creating functional financial reporting.
• Deep understanding of database fundamentals, including relational and multidimensional
              database design.
• Proficiency in the use of query and reporting analysis tools.
• Strong skills in standardizing data collection through database design and validation reports.
• Experience in providing application analysis and data modeling design for centralized data    
              warehousing.
Additional Qualifications:
• Experience with data visualization best practices.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.



Portfolio of Previous Projects Required:

Candidates must provide a portfolio showcasing previous Power BI development projects. This portfolio should highlight the candidate's ability to design and implement operational reports, automated dashboards, and data presentations using Power BI and other relevant tools. The portfolio should demonstrate the candidate's proficiency in data visualization, report customization, and data extraction techniques.

Note: Exclusively for Filipino Applicants

Category: Data Analytics

Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence, SQL, Data Analysis

item.title: Budget Analysis and Statistical Chart Compilation - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled freelancer to compile budget information and transform complex financial data into easy-to-understand charts and graphs that are clear, concise, and visually appealing statistical charts for my business.  Budget performance sheets will be provided on a weekly and monthly basis and I am asking for someone to compile and provide performance statistical charts.

Project Scope:

Compile budget information from various sources.
Analyze and organize financial data.
Create a series of statistical charts (bar charts, pie charts, line graphs, etc.) to visually represent budget data.
Ensure accuracy and clarity in all visualizations.
Provide a summary of insights derived from the data.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in financial analysis and data visualization.
Proficiency in Excel, Google Sheets, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
Ability to meet deadlines and communicate effectively.
Previous experience working with budgets and financial data is a plus.

Requirements:
Provide examples of previous work related to financial data visualization.
Detail your approach to handling financial data and ensuring accuracy.
Outline your availability and estimated timeline for completing the project.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal through Upwork, including:

A brief introduction about yourself and your relevant experience and examples of similar projects you have completed.
Your proposed rate and estimated time required to complete the project.

Any questions or clarifications you might need from us.
We look forward to collaborating with a talented freelancer who can help us present our budget information in a clear and compelling way. Thank you for your interest!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00

item.title: Data Analyst & KPI Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst & KPI Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience with data analysis, correlation of multiple databases, and expertise in using data visualization tools like Power BI. This role involves not only maintaining and tracking existing Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) but also driving the creation of new KPIs through collaborative meetings with leadership.

Responsibilities:

Correlate data from multiple databases to generate meaningful insights.
Utilize Power BI to create and maintain dashboards and reports.
Track and analyze KPIs to monitor performance and identify trends.
Collaborate with leadership to understand business goals and develop new KPIs.
Present data insights and recommendations to stakeholders.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity in all reporting.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Data Analyst or similar role.
Proficiency in Power BI and other data visualization tools.
Strong knowledge of database management and data correlation techniques.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Ability to communicate complex data insights clearly and effectively.
Experience in creating and tracking KPIs.
Ability to work collaboratively with leadership to drive strategic decisions.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with additional data analysis tools and software.
Knowledge of specific industry-related KPIs.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Application Process:

Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter detailing your experience and why you are the right fit for this role. Include examples of your previous work with data analysis and KPI tracking if available.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

Category: Data Analytics
